title: Font suggestions for my clients logo
content:
Hey everyone,

I am designing a logo for Prestige Promotions and Limo Hire. They are wanting the brand to be stylish and classy. I am looking for a font that would capture this idea, and was hoping to get some suggestions, the client has a small budget so I wont be able to spend big mony on fonts.

Below is some added info of the services the company offers

So basically the business offers 3 services:

1: Promotional services - The best promotional models available to promote maximum impact for any event.  
2: Luxury Vehicle Hire - Top of the range vehicles to transport you in true star style to any event.  
3. Party Vehicle Hire - The most beautiful models available to host you and your party in our luxury vehicles and accompany you on your special occasion.

Thanks heaps!!
author: Michael palmer

comments.content:
Do you have tried the myfonts search? The fonts are tagged with keywords.

And what does big money mean in this context? You donâ€™t need a big type system for a logo, but just one or two font styles.

It is contradictory to provide a luxury service, but not to have a few Dollars for one or two font styles.
Yes you would think this would be contradictory but it's the clients money not mine, any suggestions?

Narziss, display and text:  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/hubertjocham/narziss/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100116143242/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/hubertjocham/narziss/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/hubertjocham/narziss/")  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/hubertjocham/narziss-text/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100116143242/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/hubertjocham/narziss-text/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/hubertjocham/narziss-text/")

Released very recently, so not yet over-used.

hhp
